messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Murder Hazard 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The station has been quarantined, attempting to flee will result in an implant detonation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Murder Hazard 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Reminder: Attempting to leave the station will result in detonation

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The experiment has concluded, you will all detonate, goodbye.
